title: The Rape of Tamar
description: Dan Jacobson retells the age-old, biblical story of the rape of King Davidâ€™s daughter by her brother Amnon. Out of this material he creates a tragic and sardonically humorous novel, wholly modern in spirit and yet true to the time in which it is set. On first publication, The Rape of Tamar was hailed as a masterpiece.
author: Dan Jacobson
